sources.title: My Gun is Quick
sources.description: “Simple, direct and gritty” “Impressive B-team effort” “Fun little detective story” (IMDB reviews quotes). An independently produced Mike Hammer adventure with tough guys and hot babes. Okay cast and adequate production with interesting views of late-fifties LA. It’s not quite film noir, but it is eminently watchable. IMDB rating 6.1. Directed by Victor Saville & George White. Releases in 1957. Complete print.

sources.title: My Gun Is Quick
sources.description: My gun is quick, Nice little BW Mike Hammer film noir film.Nice sound track. Couldn't be made today

metadata.Plot: The captivating story of Sweden's greatest judicial scandal ever, about one man who sacrificed everything in his hunt for the truth.
metadata.Actors: Selma Glasell, Jonas Karlsson, David Dencik
